experiences.title: Independent Consultant & Technology Innovation Leader

star.task: Design and implement enterprise-grade SaaS solutions with clean architecture, establish CI/CD best practices, mentor development teams, and drive product R&D from concept to market.
star.action: Implemented SaaS solutions using Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, and Redis capable of processing >5,000 URLs/hour. Built automated testing frameworks achieving >85% coverage. Deployed comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. Conducted cloud migrations and established documentation standards. Led R&D initiatives in NLP, sentiment analysis, and reputation KPIs.
star.result: Successfully delivered multiple digital transformation projects. Improved deployment frequency and system reliability through automated CI/CD. Reduced operational incidents through comprehensive monitoring. Validated product-market fit for media intelligence solution and developed go-to-market strategy.

highlights: Led digital transformation and automation projects for SMEs and startups
Implemented SaaS solutions capable of large-scale data processing (>5,000 URLs/hour)
Developed CI/CD pipelines with >85% test coverage
Deployed comprehensive monitoring (Prometheus, Grafana)
Drove product R&D in media intelligence (NLP, sentiment analysis)
